remarks: Lemma for ~ plycj and ~ coecj .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
statement:
plycj.1 $e |- N = ( deg ` F ) $.
plycj.2 $e |- G = ( ( * o. F ) o. * ) $.
plycjlem.3 $e |- A = ( coeff ` F ) $.
plycjlem $p |- ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) -> G = ( z e. CC |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ( ( ( * o. A ) ` k ) x. ( z ^ k ) ) ) ) $.
$d A k z $.
$d F k z $.
$d N k z $.
$d S k z $.
